abstract: Kathleen Kennedy, a longtime producer who worked on films such as “Seabiscuit” and “The Diving Bell and the Butterfly,” will become co-chairwoman of George Lucas’s film company, as Mr. Lucas moves closer to what he says will be his retirement.
snippet: Kathleen Kennedy, a longtime producer who worked on films such as “Seabiscuit” and “The Diving Bell and the Butterfly,” will become co-chairwoman of George Lucas’s film company, as Mr. Lucas moves closer to what he says will be his retirement.
lead_paragraph: 5:17 p.m. | Updated LOS ANGELES — Having told a movie magazine that he plans to retire soon, George Lucas on Friday announced a surprise successor for his posts at privately held Lucasfilm: the Hollywood producer Kathleen Kennedy.

headline.main: Prominent Hollywood Producer to Assume Key Roles at Lucasfilm
